body_html:
I was able to resolve this by changing tensorflow/core/BUILD as follows at line 325:

cc_library(
    name = "user_ops_op_lib",
    srcs = glob(["user_ops/**/*.cc"]),
    copts = tf_copts(),
    linkstatic = 1,
    visibility = ["//visibility:public"],
    deps = [":framework", "//tensorflow/core/kernels:reader_base"],
    alwayslink = 1,
)

Works for now but a broader dependency might be better?

body:
I was able to resolve this by changing tensorflow/core/BUILD as follows at line 325:

```
cc_library(
    name = "user_ops_op_lib",
    srcs = glob(["user_ops/**/*.cc"]),
    copts = tf_copts(),
    linkstatic = 1,
    visibility = ["//visibility:public"],
    deps = [":framework", "//tensorflow/core/kernels:reader_base"],
    alwayslink = 1,
)

```

Works for now but a broader dependency might be better?
